summary: On Christmas Eve, a regretful husband admits to his high-spirited wife that he has hired a contract killer to take her out. She immediately flees. A nice couple offers her shelter, but everyone have dark secrets in this wacky movie.
cast: Mia Farrow|Tony Goldwyn|Juana Barrios|Mike Heibeck|Vee Brown|Jack Gilpin|Scott Glenn|Mary-Louise Parker|William Duell|Deborah Rush|Anthony Pagano|Debra Monk|Giancarlo Esposito|Joanne Krispin|Lisa Krispin|Mary Beth Peil|Lindsay Mae Sawyer|William Fichtner|William Preston|John Magill|Zach Grenier|Lisa Louise Langford|Eileen Brennan|Walter Bryant|Doug Barron|Maureen Silliman|Ron Bagden|Ladd Patellis|Pat Distefano|Elijah Nicole Rosello|Nancy Marchand|Nesbitt Blaisdell|Stephen Dorff|John D. Bair
title: Reckless
